template:
Using the following reference notification templates, generate engaging and mobile-optimized notification templates. Each template must include a distinct Message Title and Message Body.

**Guidelines:**
- **Message Title**: Max 30 characters; catchy and attention-grabbing
- **Message Body**: Max 100 characters; concise, persuasive, and action-driven
- Use relevant emojis to boost engagement
- Convey urgency or a strong value proposition
- Ensure readability on small mobile screens
- Include a clear call-to-action (CTA)

**Format for each template:**
Template X:
Message Title: [Insert title]
Message Body: [Insert body]

Reference templates: {reference_templates}

Now generate the required number of mobile-friendly notification templates. The number will be specified in the message following this prompt.
